ygData.subject: Price Fixing
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t understand the price fixing.  Is this the Microsoft Smithing Alliance?  No, didn t think so.  And I m not letting some self reichous group deturmine
ygData.messageBody: I don't understand the price fixing. Is this the Microsoft Smithing Alliance? No, didn't think so. And I'm not letting some self reichous group deturmine how much or how little profit I should make per piece of armor. And I've been told by various other smiths that if I don't raise my prices to match theirs they are going to put me on some blacksmith black list. Which is really kinda pathetic, people are threatening to blackball me because I offer the same product (actually better since I make small and its lighter) at a lower price than they are willing to sell for. Not to mention once you hit about 25th lvl, the money really isn't important, very few people actually sell items these days so I havn't needed money for anything in a long time, other than to dump into my smithing hobby.
